name: VR Horror in the Forest
description:
Enjoy Horror in the Forest RollerCoaster train ride filled with evil ghosts. Horror in the Forest is a 2 minutes and 50 seconds long scary ride put in a dark forest. The forsaken forest is filled with scary elements like an old graveyard, spooky church, whispering in the background, crows flying around, dark background music to enjoy etc. Don't get scared to quickly.

No remote control or Bluetooth controller needed since you control everything by rotating your head.

Note #1: This VR RollerCoaster requires a VR headset like Google Cardboard for best results.

Note #2: This VR Jurassic Coaster was made for high-end phones with a gyroscope. It may work on slower phones, but you will experience a lower refresh rate.

If you like Horror in the Forest, please give it a rate and a review.
